title: Werbeflaechen
subtitle: Your self-marketing framework - the foundation for great CVs

autofill.title: Auto-fill from CV
autofill.description: Paste your existing CV/resume text and we'll extract relevant information into your Werbeflaechen categories.
autofill.minCharsError: Please paste your CV text (minimum 50 characters)

vision_mission.title: Vision & Mission
vision_mission.description: Your professional vision and mission - where you want to go and what drives you

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.description: What motivates you in your work and career

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Your professional passions and what excites you about your work

slogan.title: Slogan
slogan.description: Your personal professional slogan or tagline

zitat_motto.title: Quote/Motto
zitat_motto.description: A quote or motto that represents your professional philosophy

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.description: Key highlights and standout moments from your career

mehrwert.title: Added Value
mehrwert.description: The unique value you bring to employers

projekte.title: Projects
projekte.description: Key projects you have worked on

usp.title: Unique Selling Point
usp.description: What makes you uniquely valuable as a professional

corporate_design.title: Personal Branding
corporate_design.description: Your personal brand and professional image

erfahrungswissen.title: Experiential Knowledge
erfahrungswissen.description: Knowledge gained through experience that sets you apart

kernkompetenzen.title: Core Competencies
kernkompetenzen.description: Your core technical and hard skills

schluesselkompetenzen.title: Key Competencies
schluesselkompetenzen.description: Your key soft skills and interpersonal competencies

berufliche_erfahrungen.title: Professional Experience
berufliche_erfahrungen.description: Your work history and professional experience

placeholders.summary: Write a brief summary of your professional profile...
placeholders.vision: Where do you see yourself in 5-10 years?
placeholders.purpose: Why do you do what you do?
placeholders.whatDrivesYou: Describe what motivates you every day...
placeholders.whyThisField: Why did you choose this professional field?
placeholders.careerGoals: What are your short-term and long-term career goals?
placeholders.slogan: A concise sentence that describes you
placeholders.tagline: An alternative version of your slogan
placeholders.notes: Add your notes and content here...

hints.slogan: Short and memorable - used as a tagline in your CV
hints.defaultForm: Specific form fields for this category will be available soon
